text: The Model and the Marriage Broker is a 1951 American romantic comedy movie directed by George Cukor and starring Jeanne Crain, Scott Brady, Thelma Ritter, Zero Mostel, Michael O'Shea, Helen Ford, Frank Fontaine. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1952. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:1951 romance movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: The Model and the Marriage Broker
